item.title: ハースト・マガジンズ・メディア・ユニオンが、「会社のリストラ」によって41人の組合員が解雇されたと発表。
item.description:
Natalie Korach / The Wrap:
Hearst Magazines Media Union says 41 of its members were laid off over “company restructuring”; impacted publications include Elle, Seventeen, and Men's Health  —  Hearst Magazines Media Union, which announced the news Thursday, says, “We are losing talented people whose creativity …

item.title: Artisan Gateway：中国における米国映画の興行収入は2023年上半期に$592Mに達し、2019年上半期の$1.9Bから減少、中国の観客は地元映画に引き寄せられる（Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Artisan Gateway: box-office sales for US films in China hit $592M in H1 2023, down from $1.9B in H1 2019, as Chinese audiences gravitate toward local movies  —  Chinese audiences are gravitating toward movies made at home, rather than in Hollywood  —  Over the past decade, Fang Fang …

item.title: サンディエゴ・ユニオン・トリビューン編集長兼発行人のジェフ・ライト氏が、オールデン社への売却後に退社する。
item.description:
Ken Stone / Times of San Diego:
San Diego Union-Tribune Editor and Publisher Jeff Light is leaving after the outlet's sale to Alden; an unofficial list of staffers taking buyouts has ~30 names  —  The editor and publisher of The San Diego Union-Tribune is leaving the paper after 13 years, he announced Thursday.

item.title: 調査ダン・ウートンはサンの同僚から少なくとも6件のいじめの訴えを受けたが、支払いとNDAで訴えを黙らせながら昇進した（Byline Times）
item.description:
Byline Times:
Investigation: Dan Wootton was the subject of at least six bullying claims from Sun colleagues but was promoted while claims were silenced with payouts and NDAs  —  In the second part of its three-year investigation, Byline Times examines the professional conduct of the TV presenter …

item.title: NMEネットワークスCOOのホリー・ビショップが、2018年に印刷物の制作を停止した後、「ハイハイプ・モデル」を使ってグローバルな隔月刊誌として再スタートさせたことについてQ&A（Ellise Shafer/Variety）
item.description:
Ellise Shafer / Variety:
Q&A with NME Networks COO Holly Bishop on relaunching the magazine as a global bimonthly using a “high-hype model” after shutting down print production in 2018  —  Iconic music publication NME is relaunching its print magazine.  —  After shutting down production in 2018 …

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ』紙のスポーツ欄を閉鎖し、スポーツニュースを『アスレチック』紙に依存するという計画に対し、ニュースルームの労働組合が苦情を申し立てた（Ben Strauss/Washington Post紙）。
item.description:
Ben Strauss / Washington Post:
The New York Times' newsroom union files a grievance over the company's plans to shutter its sports section and rely on The Athletic for sports news coverage  —  The union representing the New York Times newsroom filed a grievance Thursday challenging the company's announcement that it plans …

item.title: ワーナー・ブラザース・アニメーションで66人、カートゥーン ネットワークで22人の制作労働者が、労働組合結成をNLRBに申請し、WBDに自主的なユニット承認を求める（Katie Kilkenny/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Katie Kilkenny / The Hollywood Reporter:
Production workers, 66 at Warner Bros. Animation and 22 at Cartoon Network, file an NLRB petition to form a union and ask WBD to voluntarily recognize the unit  —  The staffers, who work on projects including ‘Batman: Caped Crusader’ and 'Adventure Time: Fionna and Cake …

item.title: テイラー家がモアブ・タイムズ・インディペンデント紙をソルトレーク・トリビューン紙に寄贈、同紙はモアブ市民には印刷物を、すべての人にはオンライン版を無料で提供する予定（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
The Taylor family donates The Moab Times-Independent to The Salt Lake Tribune, which plans to offer the weekly free in print to Moab residents and online to all  —  The Moab Times-Independent, owned for generations by the Taylor family, will be donated to the Tribune.

item.title: 情報源: Tally CapitalのMatthew Roszak氏とCapital6のPeter Vessenes氏が率いる投資家シンジケートが、CoinDeskの買収に近づいている。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: a syndicate of investors led by Matthew Roszak of Tally Capital and Peter Vessenes of Capital6 is close to acquiring CoinDesk in a deal worth ~$125M  —  Syndicate is led by Matthew Roszak of Tally Capital and Peter Vessenes of Capital6  —  A syndicate of investors is in the final stages …

item.title: 失敗に終わったジジ・ソーンのFCC承認：ジョー・バイデンは2021年10月に彼女を指名し、激しい反対運動の末、497日後に辞退した（Makena Kelly/The Verge）
item.description:
Makena Kelly / The Verge:
A look at Gigi Sohn's unsuccessful FCC confirmation: Joe Biden nominated her in October 2021 and she withdrew 497 days later after a fierce opposition campaign  —  ‘Dark money’ and the never-ending election cycle kept a qualified consumer advocate out of the Federal Communications Commission.

item.title: 情報筋AMCエンタテインメントが座席位置価格プランを取り下げ、テストでは映画ファンがより良い席には高い金を払わず、より悪い席には安い金を払わなかったため収益が伸びなかった（Thomas Buckley/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Buckley / Bloomberg:
Sources: AMC Entertainment drops its seat location pricing plan; a test didn't grow revenue as moviegoers didn't pay up for better seats or less for worse seats  —  The world's largest cinema chain, which said in February it would expand its tiered-pricing structure to theaters in the US and Canada …

item.title: ハーパーコリンズは8月1日、ハーレクイン・トレード・パブリッシング部門傘下のヤングアダルト版元であるインキヤード・プレスを閉鎖し、全スタッフをレイオフする予定だ（Jim Milliot/Publishers Weekly）。
item.description:
Jim Milliot / Publishers Weekly:
HarperCollins plans to shut down Inkyard Press, its young adult imprint under the Harlequin Trade Publishing division, and lay off all its staff on August 1  —  In a week that has seen Penguin Random House's workforce winnowed by buyouts and layoffs and the Independent Publishers Group lay off nine staffers …

item.title: VivendiのCanal+がViaplay Groupの株式12%を取得、2023年6月には香港のストリーミングサービスViuの株式26.1%を$300Mで取得予定（Max Goldbart/Deadline）
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
Vivendi's Canal+ acquires a 12% stake in Viaplay Group; in June 2023, Canal+ planned to acquire a 26.1% stake in Hong Kong-based streaming service Viu for $300M  —  Canal+ has taken a minority stake in embattled Nordic outfit Viaplay Group, which this morning announced it was making 25% of its workforce redundant.

item.title: メディアパートナーズ・アジア2023年1月から6月までの東アジアにおけるSVOD視聴者の50％、フリーミアム視聴者の42％を韓国のプレミアムVODコンテンツが獲得（Patrick Frater/Variety）
item.description:
Patrick Frater / Variety:
Media Partners Asia: South Korean premium VOD content captured 50% of SVOD viewership and 42% of freemium viewership across East Asia from January to June 2023  —  Korean TV series and films are increasing still further their hold on streaming audiences across East Asia.

item.title: ハズブロ社が英国でのエンタテインメント・ワンの劇場運営を停止する計画。情報筋によれば、ハズブロ社は世界的な15％削減の一環として、同国でのスタッフを削減するとのこと（Andreas Wiseman/Deadline）
item.description:
Andreas Wiseman / Deadline:
Hasbro plans to shut down Entertainment One's theatrical operations in the UK; sources say Hasbro will reduce staff in the country as part of its global 15% cut  —  EXCLUSIVE: Hasbro's reshaping of eOne continues with multiple sources telling us that the latter will cease theatrical operations in the UK.
